dmca.title: Notice of Claimed Copyright Infringement III (Third DocumentedIncident)
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Mark McKool [mailto:mark@markmckool.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 03, 2007 2:47 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice of Claimed Copyright Infringement III (Third
DocumentedIncident)



ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110, Dallas, TX 75207
(214) 782-7800
(214) 782-7756

copyright@theplanet.com





Notice of Claimed Copyright Infringement III



My client Jennifer Korbin is requesting the removal of mentioned
material, from a site hosted on ThePlanet.com servers, as it pertains to
her company's intellectual property. The images and files posted for
download are without the consent of Jennifer Korbin, or
Jenniferkorbin.com. All material is in fact copyrighted.
BIKINIBIKINI.COM is in Violation of TOS and we are submitting DMCA
Notification at this time. Per TOS BIKINIBIKINI.COM is infringing on the
rights of multitudes by allowing the publishing of Copyrighted materials
possibly at BIKINIBIKINI.COM's own monetary benefit. My Client Jennifer
Korbin is growing tired of being forced to monitor this website
(BIKINIBIKINI.COM) to insure that the rights of her company are not
infringed. This is the THIRD incident / Notice of Claimed Copyright
Infringement regarding BIKINIBIKINI.COM called to the attention of The
Planet.com. As a result of this type of Image Hijacking
Jenniferkorbin.com is losing revenue from it's own site. Further action
on our behalf may be necessary in order to resolve this
ongoing/continuing situation.
 
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:
  

-ALL JENNIFER KORBIN IMAGES LOCATED IN THE LINKS BELOW- 


The material that is the subject of the infringing activity and that is
to be removed or access to which is to be disabled by ThePlanet.com is
located in links below.

 
Bikini Bikini > Babes > Redheads> 


 http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread110721.html
http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread110721-2.html

http://www.bikinibikini.com/forum/thread109442.html


The complaining party has a good faith belief that use of the material
in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent, or law. The information in this notification is accurate, and
under penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to
act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

 
 
Mark McKool
P.O. BOX 701927
Dallas TX 75370-1927
972-818-6966
mark@markmckool.com
korbinkompany@aol.com
